patthana15.72:4.1: Araṇaṃ vipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.72:5.1: Saraṇaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.72:5.2: Araṇaṃ vipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo navipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.72:6.1: Araṇaṃ nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
